hero_lead:
Expertise for children and families.
We grow together with proven technology and global brands.
ideology_ceo_lead:
A baby care company building a happier society
based on child safety and parental trust
ideology_ceo_sign:
Lee Eui-hwan
CEO, AONE Co., Ltd.
On behalf of all employees
ideology_ceo_body:
Hello.

AONE Co., Ltd., a baby care company founded in 2010, builds on the management philosophy of Kesung Industry, which began in 1958 in export manufacturing and specialized in baby care products from 1988.

For over 20 years, we have partnered with leading global baby care brands including Evenflo, Combi, Bebe, Confort, Pali, and Teamtex from the US, Europe, and Japan, applying world-class safety standards to lead the domestic baby care market.

With this expertise, we launched the RYAN brand and maintain our position as Korea's No. 1 safe stroller, honored with Forbes Best Brand Award and Korea First Brand Award for 13 consecutive years.

We also offer trusted products at fair prices, including the UK's GLOBAL NO.1 brand JOIE and Tavo Pets, setting new standards in pet lifestyle.

AONE believes that a child's happiness lays the foundation for a better future.

We continue social contribution activities such as donating baby products to low-income and multicultural families and partnerships with welfare organizations for children's safe and happy lives.

Through investment and culture improvement, we were selected as a Family-Friendly Certified Company by the Ministry of Employment and Labor in 2014 and maintain this certification today.

With each child's preciousness in mind, AONE will never stop striving to deliver "Experience, and beyond" with the unwavering love of parents.

Thank you for walking this path with us.
ideology_mission_sub: A company built on child safety and parental trust
ideology_mission_text: We aim to grow into a global baby care specialist through our in-house developed RYAN brand and partnerships with leading overseas baby care companies.
ideology_vision_text: With integrity, trust, creativity and communication as our core values, we lead the way in building a happier society for children through trusted baby care products.
ideology_value_honesty_desc: As a company that grows with children's dreams, we develop only products that customers can trust through honest and sincere dedication.
ideology_value_creativity_desc: We build a culture of innovation through creative talent and open communication.
ideology_value_trust_desc: We prioritize customer trust and strive to become a company customers can rely on through the best technology and services.
ideology_value_communication_desc: We ensure fast and accurate information sharing internally, and maintain ongoing dialogue with customers to deliver the best in products and services.
history_intro: The beginning and growth of AONE Co., Ltd.
history_quote:
A company devoted to babies and mothers,
AONE Co., Ltd., taking a new leap forward as a baby care specialist.
history_timeline_1958:
Founding of Kesung Industry
Export of textile products to Japanese market
history_timeline_1988:
Kesung Industry Co., Ltd. company name change
Transition to baby care specialist
Exclusive distribution contracts with Evenflo, Cosco (US), Combi (Japan)
history_timeline_2002: Partnership with TEAMTEX, world's largest car seat specialist
history_timeline_2008: Launch of domestic stroller brand RYAN
history_timeline_2010:
TEAMTEX car seat Nania launch
AONE Co., Ltd. established as baby care specialist
history_timeline_2011: Exclusive distribution contract with Dutch premium brand NUNA
history_timeline_2012:

ci_slogan: a baby but the only ONE
ci_desc: AONE was born from the belief that every child's birth can lead to a special, valuable life and ultimately shape the world.
ci_colorsystem_desc: The color system used in AONE's CI is a key element that conveys our image alongside our logo. Centered on AONE ORANGE and BLACK, it embodies our sincerity toward every child's birth.
